justification: Some nod to B’s need for depth, but misreads his preference for stable floors (Anderson and Mitchell are volatile/committee) and ignores zero-RB/contrarian tendencies. Major error: calling Justin Wright an upgrade for A when A already has a healthy Tier 1 TE; Wright is Tier 5 and out. Value and rationale are inconsistent, though the swap is feasible and B might accept to dump an injured TE.
